title: Turkey Calls On U.S. To Ramp Up ISIS Airstrikes In Syrian Border Town
teaser: Robert Siegel talks to The Washington Post's Liz Sly, from Turkey, where she's been covering the assault by ISIS on the Syrian Kurdish town of Kobani, near the Turkish border.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
